og.title: Barber shop hearkens to the ‘Best of Times’

twitter.description: DOVER — Josh Hynes and his wife, Cherish, returned home from the hospital last Friday with their newborn baby girl. The next day, Hynes opened Best of Times Barber Shop at 364 Central Ave., in the space formerly occupied by Dover Wine and Brew. Hynes, 31, and four other barbers offer hot towel shaves, haircuts, and shoe shines in the 1950s-themed barbershop. He and the other barbers are snappily dressed in button-down shirts with ties and vests. Patrons sit on antique barber chairs that
